description.narrative: The project will help Mandalay further grow as the cultural, educational, and economic hub of Upper Myanmar and act as a national economic center. This approach will foster balanced national development by reducing the concentration of population and economic activities in Yangon and promoting economic growth in Mandalay Region and its surroundings. The project impact will be improved urban environment and public health in Mandalay. The outcome will be improved access to sustainable urban services in Mandalay. Project outputs are (i) improved water supply systems, (ii) improved wastewater and drainage management, and (iii) strengthened capacity for urban services management.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President

description.narrative: Access to sustainable urban services in Mandalay improved

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President
a. Households with access to water supply without interruption increased to 124,000 (2014 baseline: 19,000)

description.narrative: Access to sustainable urban services in Mandalay improved
Access to sustainable urban services in Mandalay improved

title.narrative: c. Direct discharge of wastewater to receiving waters reduced to 25,000 cubic meters/day

description.narrative: Access to sustainable urban services in Mandalay improved

title.narrative: d. Households living in wards affected by seasonal flooding reduced to 18,000 (2014 baseline: 92,000) with frequency of flooding raised to 1 in 2 years (2014 baseline: more than 1 in 6 months)

description.narrative: Access to sustainable urban services in Mandalay improved

title.narrative: e. Budgets for water supply and sanitation operations ring-fenced

description.narrative: Access to sustainable urban services in Mandalay improved
